A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don’t listen to the angry fanboys. They are probably the same ones that complained that The Force Awakens was just a repeat of A New Hope\, and now they are complaining that The Last Jedi is too different? The Last Jedi is a very good movie that looks to start a new chapter with a new group of characters\, and I for one applaud it. Is it perfect? No. But it’s highly entertaining\, and VERY much a Star Wars movie. I can’t wait to see what next in this saga\, & look forward to seeing what Rian Johnson does next with the new trilogy in a few years! (For the record I’m a huge Star Wars fan\, and have been for 30+ years)
